TITLE: Running All Tests for Pest PHP DESCRIPTION: Command to run the complete test suite for the Pest PHP project using Composer. SOURCE: https://github.com/pestphp/pest/blob/3.x/CONTRIBUTING.md#2025-04-20_snippet_3 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` composer test ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Running Unit Tests for Pest PHP DESCRIPTION: Command to run only the unit tests in the Pest PHP project. SOURCE: https://github.com/pestphp/pest/blob/3.x/CONTRIBUTING.md#2025-04-20_snippet_5 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` composer test:unit ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Running Integration Tests for Pest PHP DESCRIPTION: Command to run only the integration tests in the Pest PHP project. SOURCE: https://github.com/pestphp/pest/blob/3.x/CONTRIBUTING.md#2025-04-20_snippet_6 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` composer test:integration ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Running Type Checking in Pest PHP DESCRIPTION: Command to perform static type checking on the Pest PHP codebase. SOURCE: https://github.com/pestphp/pest/blob/3.x/CONTRIBUTING.md#2025-04-20_snippet_4 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` composer test:type:check ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Installing Developer Dependencies for Pest PHP DESCRIPTION: Command to install the development dependencies required for contributing to the Pest PHP project using Composer. SOURCE: https://github.com/pestphp/pest/blob/3.x/CONTRIBUTING.md#2025-04-20_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` composer install ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Linting Code for Pest PHP DESCRIPTION: Command to lint your code to ensure it adheres to the Pest PHP coding standards. SOURCE: https://github.com/pestphp/pest/blob/3.x/CONTRIBUTING.md#2025-04-20_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` composer lint ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Running Pest Tests Before Release DESCRIPTION: Command to run the test suite locally using Composer to verify everything works before release. SOURCE: https://github.com/pestphp/pest/blob/3.x/RELEASE.md#2025-04-20_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: shell CODE: ``` composer test ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Updating Snapshots in Pest PHP Tests DESCRIPTION: Command to update test snapshots in the Pest PHP project, which is needed when test expectations change. SOURCE: https://github.com/pestphp/pest/blob/3.x/CONTRIBUTING.md#2025-04-20_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` composer update:snapshots ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Using Docker with Custom PHP Version for Pest PHP Development DESCRIPTION: Command to build a Docker image for Pest PHP development with a specific PHP version. This allows testing against different PHP versions. SOURCE: https://github.com/pestphp/pest/blob/3.x/CONTRIBUTING.md#2025-04-20_snippet_7 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` make build ARGS="--build-arg PHP=8.3" ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Tagging and Pushing Pest Release DESCRIPTION: Commands to create a version tag and push it to the remote repository, triggering the release process on GitHub. SOURCE: https://github.com/pestphp/pest/blob/3.x/RELEASE.md#2025-04-20_snippet_3 LANGUAGE: shell CODE: ``` git tag vX.X.X && git push --tags ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Committing Version Update for Release DESCRIPTION: Git command to commit the updated version number in Pest.php with a standardized release commit message format. SOURCE: https://github.com/pestphp/pest/blob/3.x/RELEASE.md#2025-04-20_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: shell CODE: ``` git commit -m "release: vX.X.X" ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Clearing Local Repository for Pest Release DESCRIPTION: Command to reset the local repository to a clean state and checkout the 3.x branch before starting the release process. SOURCE: https://github.com/pestphp/pest/blob/3.x/RELEASE.md#2025-04-20_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: shell CODE: ``` git add . && git reset --hard && git checkout 3.x ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: HTML Banner and Badges DESCRIPTION: HTML markup for displaying the Pest framework banner image and status badges for tests, downloads, version and license.
